p: Estevam et al. (2017) [ 41] investigated the trypanocidal activity of the EO of Protium ovatum Engl. against T. cruzi trypomastigotes (IC 50 = 28.55 μg/mL). The main compounds found in the EO were spathulenol, caryophylene oxide, β-caryophylene, and myrcene. However, the EO demonstrated moderate cytotoxicity against LLCMK 2 adherent epithelial cells (CC 50 = 150.9 μg/mL).
